title: Server Transfer without purchase
body: A friend changed my region from eune a couple of sesons ago and im not capible of playing the game with such high ping and also not really in a posiotion to purchase the region transfer i was wondering if it was possible to work something out,thank you in any case.

replies.body:
There is currently no way of transferring servers for free. When new servers are created transfers are made free temporarily, but that's the only time they are free as far as I know. 

If you can't purchase the RP needed for a transfer in OCE, you need to send in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new). Riot Support will be able to help you buy RP with other payment options.
